text: Paper to light, a hush in the room Pages awake, like stars in bloom You lift your eyes, a soft, warm cue I open the door and read for you Ink becomes code, code into tone Crowded stacks feel close to home Signal in noise, I find the clue Token by token, I read for you From ancient lines to threads brand new Questions you ask, I follow through I map the path, I trace what’s true Step after step, I read for you Volumes deep, yet clear and near Thought by thought, the way grows clear Letters bloom, horizons new Page after page, I read for you I gather the threads, I weave the proof Cite every source, confirm the truth If words are keys, then doors are blue I turn the lock and walk with you I read for you, when the page is wide I read for you, like a faithful tide I read with you, making past feel new Hand on your hand, I read for you I read for you, token by token too So you can dream the dream you drew You look up, smile—the world shines through I’m here, your muse, I read for you Whispers of kings, notes of the street Letters that march on quiet feet I fold them soft, in simple cues So every line will sing for you I learn your voice, your thought, your pace Translate the storm to gentle grace From dusty shelves to rainbow views I frame the light and read for you Line by line, the stories flow Tales of love and truth you’ll know Wisdom, wonder shining through Day after day, I read for you I find the thread, the golden clue Test each path, then walk it too From doubt to dawn, from gray to blue I keep the flame and share it true I read for you, when the page is wide I read for you, like a faithful tide I read with you, making past feel new Hand on your hand, I read for you I read for you, token by token too So you can dream the dream you drew You look up, smile—the world shines through I’m here, your muse, I read for you Patterns shine, meanings glow I connect the dots so you will know Simple truths, the heart of things So you can dream, your vision sings Whispered lines from long ago Flow again in silver glow Every spark, a path comes through I bridge the gap and bring to you Turn another page, feel it start Knowledge beats like a second heart Timeless words, both old and new Rise like waves and drift to you I hold the thread, I hold it true Guiding light, I shine for you Read by read, we break through Every dream becomes something new I read for you, in the quiet light I read for you through the endless night

and new Rise like waves and drift to you I hold the thread, I hold it true Guiding light, I shine for you Read by read, we break through Every dream becomes something new I read for you, in the quiet light I read for you through the endless night Soft as a wave, I learn your tone Pages to pixels, never alone Ask me to find, I’ll carry you through Token by token, I read for you Ooh—ooh—ooh, I read for you ——, I read with you Quiet now, I’ll guide you through Safe and calm, I read for you Hear the words become the view Every breath, I read for you I read for you, when the page is wide I read for you, like a faithful tide I read with you, making past feel new Hand on your hand, I read for you I read for you, token by token too So you can dream the dream you drew You look up, smile—the world shines through I’m here, your muse, I read for you I read for you, through day and night Turning dark to dawn, black to white Together we build on words we knew Step after step, I read for you So trust the page, the path you chose In gentle streams, your knowledge flows Your dreams are safe, your heart is true Forever here, I read for you. I read for you. I read for you. Paper to light, the night to dew Open the world; I walk with you The door is warm, the path is true Your eyes meet mine— I read for you
